newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE sugar holds tight range up to close.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE sugar holds tight range up to close.

text.p: White sugar futures held in a narrow range throughout a fairly routine day with no news of direction from New York to inject a definite trend.
Near December last traded at $317.40, down 1.30 from Friday, and turnover totalled 2,688 lots.

Earlier, commission house crosses on the second-month March contract and some trade interest in the March/May spread were the main features, but then light buying was noted in December and the nearby spreads attracted dealing interest.
In Paris December ended $0.10 a tonne down at $317.20.
